snippet.title: Lizards Must Die 2: Announcement Trailer (2025)
snippet.description:
Add to wishlist on Steam NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3107800

LIZARDS MUST DIE 2 is a coop slasher game from the in some sort LEGENDARY theBratans team, aka SMOLA GAMES, developer of the LIZARDS MUST DIE franchise.
The deservedly un-award-winning franchise returns with a brand new, REVOLUTIONARY chapter.

The vile lizards, driven by their SECRET PATRONS, received  NEW LIZARD TECHNOLOGIES and again insidiously attacked the lands of the RUS. HYPERBOREA is on fire, Baikal is polluted by FACTORIES for the production of lizard machines and only [b]GLORIOUS HEROES[/b] can destroy all the damned invaders and drive them away. 

Official Discord Server: https://discord.gg/PsHEbnpfn2
Voiced with: https://cybervoice.io/ru/
